medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in her usual state of health until yesterday evening when she developed acute onset abdominal pain following a meal. Since last night, the pain has worsened and localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). She reports continued chills and emesis, with six episodes of non-bloody non-bilious emesis, diarrhea, and chills. She denies urinary symptoms, vaginal bleeding, and constipation.
